Scattering.mÂ¶

This is the documentation of the scattering.m toolbox. The browser version of this document uses MathJax, a JavaScript display engine for math equations. In order to view these equations, you need to enable Java as well as JavaScript in your browser. Visit whatismybrowser.com to check if both are up-to-date and running. If the problem persists, read the PDF version instead.
